titles.title: Social Security Act Improvements for the Terminally Ill Act
To amend the Social Security Act to eliminate the five-month waiting period in the disability insurance program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 10/6/2000--Introduced. Social Security Act Improvements for the Terminally Ill Act - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the five- month waiting period in the disability insurance program for terminally ill individuals.
